title: No new mail came in.
content: Every time I start the software the server connection is reset and no new emails are coming in. What should I do?
creator: katsudc

title: Login Issues with Hotmail account
content:
Hello, Basically I made a new Hotmail account to use for thunderbird and when I tried to add it, seems there is some sort of error. I think maybe its on Microsoft's side but not sure what I can do other then report it. I have outlined my steps in the images attached:

Step1 sign in Step2 put in password Step3 skip require recovery email Step4 Accept third party apps (Thunderbird) Step5 Account wont sign in or be added to thunderbird no matter what I do. I tried everything.

This thunderbird instances is up to date running on windows 11 machine and the hotmail account is brand new. I have two other emails on thunderbird but both are imap from my own domains. Thanks!
creator: hitmanjammer
